faq.question: apple macbook air  Can this be hooked up to an HP monitor?
faq.answer: Yes it can hook up to any monitor . You just need to have the right adaptor .

faq.question: apple macbook air  Can you update the OS to the new Mojave?
faq.answer: According to Apple - MacBook Air (Mid 2012 or newer) can update. Earlier models can't.

faq.question: apple macbook air  What kind of warranty does this come with?
faq.answer: It comes with 30 days warranty from the seller

faq.question: apple macbook air  What is retina display?
faq.answer: It is a propietary screen technology that comes in most apple products. View this site for more information : https://www.webopedia.com/TERM/R/retina_display.html.

faq.question: apple macbook air  What year is this?
faq.answer: If it is Brand New then it would be 2019 or 2020. But if you find it refurbished, it would be in between 2000 to 2018. I hope that you check the date that you bought it would be a current year or you would be stuck with lots of updates operating system.

faq.question: apple macbook air  What OS version is this?
faq.answer: macOS Catalina 10.15.2

faq.question: apple macbook air  Does this product come in a factory sealed, unopened box? (Looking for an answer from the seller)
faq.answer: Yes this item is delivered in factory sealed box.

faq.question: apple macbook air  Is it touch screen?
faq.answer: No

faq.question: apple macbook air  We cannot find a cover that works? What size cover works?
faq.answer: I ordered it from Amazon

faq.question: apple macbook air  What year is this?
faq.answer: It’s 2017 actually. Match the manufacturer number (MQD32LL) with the Apple website and it says it was made in 2017.

faq.question: apple macbook air  How do I know it’s a brand new MacBook if it says it’s sold by amazon ?
faq.answer: It is this model: https://everymac.com/systems/apple/macbook-air/specs/macbook-air-core-i5-1.8-13-2017-specs.html It is 2017, and it doesn't have USB-C. It also only has the dual-core CPU. You cannot expand the RAM but with some work expand storage.

faq.question: apple macbook air  Does this have a Retina display?
faq.answer: No, it does not have a Retina display.

faq.question: apple macbook air  Tell me about Apple macbook
faq.answer: Thin, light weight, dependable, easy to use. If you have an iPhone or desktop Apple computer, you can connect and share easily

faq.question: apple macbook air  Is there a dvd/cd drive
faq.answer: No. No MacBook Air laptops have a CD/DVD drive.

faq.question: apple macbook air  Does it have cd or dvd capability?
faq.answer: This device has no internal optical drive, but an external Apple SuperDrive (purchased separately) can be added

faq.question: apple macbook air  Can this play 1080p movies?
faq.answer: Yes should play fine

faq.question: apple macbook air  Does it have touch screen ?
faq.answer: It does not have a touch screen.

faq.question: apple macbook air Can I upgarde RAM?
faq.answer: It's a MacBook Ofcourse you can't.

faq.question: apple macbook air  Does it have a back lit keyboard?
faq.answer: Yes. Most MacBook air models have backlight keyboard.

faq.question: apple macbook air  Can I use as a paperweight??
faq.answer: Yes, you can. However I have found that a journey down to a local easily accessible river and conducting a survey of items there is more prudent. In my search I happened to find an igneous object composed of mainly granite. It was of size and shape that ideally functioned as a paperweight and the cost was 1/10000000000 of this MacBook.
